Rulings.Base:
1. The effect to add a "Meklord Emperor" monster to your hand starts a Chain and can be used during the Damage Step.
2. If "Mystical Space Typhoon" is Chained to this card's activation and destroys it, you will be unable to add 1 "Meklord Emperor" monster to your hand.
3. If the activation of this card is negated, you will be unable to add 1 "Meklord Emperor" monster to your hand.
4. If this card is destroyed while Set face-down, you can activate the effect to add a "Meklord Emperor" monster to your hand.
